3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Animate Dead
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell creates an undead servant to obey your spoken commands.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Beacon of Hope
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Bestow Curse
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Clairvoyance
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Create Food and Water
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Daylight
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Glyph of Warding
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, either upon a surface (such as a table or a section of floor or wall) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest).

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Magic Circle
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Mass Healing Word
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Meld into Stone
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all the equipment you carry with the stone for the duration.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Remove Curse
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Revivify
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Sending
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Speak with Dead
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You grant the semblance of life and intelligence to a corpse of your choice within range, allowing it to answer the questions you pose.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Spirit Guardians
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: You call forth spirits to protect you.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Tongues
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

3rdLevelClericSpells.Name: Water Walk
3rdLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.
